column4: hey, I'm trying to install ubuntu (or actually mint :p) on an macbook pro, can anyone give me any hints on how to do it, i mean on a pc it's easy but doesnt mac have efi instead of bios etc? partitioning? dont want to mess up my gfs comp
well, you said you wanted to install mint, they have a good support process
they will know better, and they are the best people to ask
